author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA PRODUCING DAMAGING WINDS, FLOODING RAINS, AND A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE IN THE BAHAMAS...
summary: ...MELISSA PRODUCING DAMAGING WINDS, FLOODING RAINS, AND A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE IN THE BAHAMAS... As of 8:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 29 the center of Melissa was located near 23.5, -74.8 with movement NNE at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 970 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
